 2016-02142016-04-06,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of RAYMOND HENAULT of Ottawa, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Advisory Panel to the Minister of National Defence on Defence Policy Review, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term expiring January 31, 2017.
